data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we have enclosed herewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, in accordance with the format specified in the accounting standards, for half year ended 31st March, 2021.
